metadata.title: CVE-2018-17436 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: ReadCode() in decompress.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library allows attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid write access) via a crafted HDF5 file. This issue was triggered while converting a GIF file to an HDF file.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
